1.title: No Money, Mo' Problems: Part 1
1.plot: Sisters Tiffany and Tonya discover that their living arrangements may be a bad idea as Tonya sees that Tiffany isn't as considerate as she would like when it comes to being financially responsible. Simone and Naomi do their best to resolve the situation.

2.title: No Money, Mo' Problems: Part 2
2.plot: Sisters Tiffany and Tonya deal with the aftermath of #TheHunnidAndFiftyDollaDress, while Patrice and Simone do their best to be mediators and ease over the tension between the two. Meanwhile, Tiffany is head over heels for her new love interest, Chase Rogers (played by Mishon), and tries to convince Tonya that he is definitely the one for her.

3.title: Friend of Mine: Part 1
3.plot: Sisters Tiffany and Tonya make nice the morning after Tiffany was stood up by Chase for their date. The sisters are introduced to a new neighbor and Tiffany must make a decision on what she should do about Chase. With one episode left in the #TiffanyAndTonya introduction series, there's SO much more #craziness in store this season!

4.title: Friend of Mine: Part 2
4.plot: After playing Roderick to the left, Tonya is surprised when he does something out of the ordinary towards her, while Tiffany is left filling in Simone, Patrice, and Naomi on just who this "creep" character is. The last episode in the #TiffanyAndTonya introduction series, there's still SO much more #craziness in store this season!

5.title: Selfish in the City: Part 1
5.plot: In this episode, we are introduced to Simone's character and delve a little into her past. Contacted by an ex-boyfriend, Simone tries to convince Naomi and Patrice that him contacting her isn't as big of a deal as they make it seem.

imdb.plot outline: Centered around the lives of five female best friends, 'MACT' is a positive, character-driven, comedic drama that highlights the issues most young single individuals struggle with today. From discovering insecurities put in place from previous relationships to navigating through the new-age dating scene, each individual will be challenged with revisiting situations from their past as well as attempting to find resolutions, balances, and encouragement in everything that surrounds them. Set in Atlanta, GA, Season 1 of the new series features some of R&B's most talented emerging male singers and songwriters such as Kameron Corvet, Richard King, and former childhood actor and buzzing singer, Mishon - each of who pose as love interests for the cast members of the promising show. Introducing you to new sounds from the above artists as well as a few other up and coming talents, the series serves as a way to not only release new music, but also give artists a way to tap into other talents that they may have. Taking inspiration from Sex and the City and Girlfriends mixed with the comedic relief of the 1997 film B*A*P*S, this scripted series delves deep into the minds of both women and men and sheds light on what may or may not cause a chain reaction of events in relationships.
